About me

Yami's Summary

Founder of Symphoria - Indie Game Studio, Scripts Contributor of RPG Maker Web Community and Global Moderator of GamesVTS Community. Beside those positions, I am a computer programmer and web designer who have more than five years experience in fields.

I have been into game development since 2010 and currently working in my own studio. In addition, I seek to become one of the best game programmer and develop Games Industry in Vietnam.

Beside game development, I also have some experience in software and web designing. In 2013, I applied for Bachelor of Software Engineering in Oulu University of Applied Sciences and still try my best to become a great software engineer in the future.
